verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

דַּבֵּ֞ר <WH1696> Speak אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵ֤י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> and say אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <WH413> about מוֹעֲדֵ֣י <WH4150> unto them [Concerning] the feasts יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which תִּקְרְא֥וּ <WH7121> which ye shall proclaim אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> מִקְרָאֵ֣י <WH4744> convocations קֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> [to be] holy אֵ֥לֶּה <WH428> are these הֵ֖ם <WH1992> like מוֹעֲדָֽי׃ <WH4150> [even] these [are] my feasts

שֵׁ֣שֶׁת <WH8337> Six יָמִים֮ <WH3117> days תֵּעָשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> be done מְלָאכָה֒ <WH4399> shall work וּבַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֗י <WH7637> but the seventh שַׁבַּ֤ת <WH7676> [is] the sabbath שַׁבָּתוֹן֙ <WH7677> of rest מִקְרָא־ <WH4744> convocation קֹ֔דֶשׁ <WH6944> an holy כָּל־ <WH3605> any מְלָאכָ֖ה <WH4399> no work לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not תַעֲשׂ֑וּ <WH6213> ye shall do שַׁבָּ֥ת <WH7676> [therein] it [is] the sabbath הִוא֙ <WH1931> he לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD בְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> all מֽוֹשְׁבֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH4186> in all your dwellings פ

אֵ֚לֶּה <WH428> These מוֹעֲדֵ֣י <WH4150> These [are] the feasts יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD מִקְרָאֵ֖י <WH4744> convocations קֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> [even] holy אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which תִּקְרְא֥וּ <WH7121> which ye shall proclaim אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> בְּמוֹעֲדָֽם׃ <WH4150> in their seasons

בַּחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הָרִאשׁ֗וֹן <WH7223> [day] of the first בְּאַרְבָּעָ֥ה <WH702> four עָשָׂ֛ר <WH6240> teen לַחֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH2320> of the month בֵּ֣ין <WH996> at הָעַרְבָּ֑יִם <WH6153> at even פֶּ֖סַח <WH6453> passover לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3069> God

וּבַחֲמִשָּׁ֨ה <WH2568> fif עָשָׂ֥ר <WH6240> teen יוֹם֙ <WH3117> day לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> of the same month הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> of the same חַ֥ג <WH2282> [is] the feast הַמַּצּ֖וֹת <WH4682> of unleavened bread לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto the LORD שִׁבְעַ֥ת <WH7651> seven יָמִ֖ים <WH3117> days מַצּ֥וֹת <WH4682> unleavened bread תֹּאכֵֽלוּ׃ <WH398> ye must eat

בַּיּוֹם֙ <WH3117> day הָֽרִאשׁ֔וֹן <WH7223> In the first מִקְרָא־ <WH4744> convocation קֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH6944> ye shall have an holy יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> shall have לָכֶ֑ם כָּל־ <WH3605> any מְלֶ֥אכֶת <WH4399> work עֲבֹדָ֖ה <WH5656> no servile לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not תַעֲשֽׂוּ׃ <WH6213> ye shall do

וְהִקְרַבְתֶּ֥ם <WH7126> But ye shall offer אִשֶּׁ֛ה <WH801> an offering made by fire לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD שִׁבְעַ֣ת <WH7651> seven יָמִ֑ים <WH3117> days בַּיּ֤וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁבִיעִי֙ <WH7637> in the seventh מִקְרָא־ <WH4744> convocation קֹ֔דֶשׁ <WH6944> [is] an holy כָּל־ <WH3605> any מְלֶ֥אכֶת <WH4399> work עֲבֹדָ֖ה <WH5656> no servile לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not תַעֲשֽׂוּ׃ <WH6213> ye shall do פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

דַּבֵּ֞ר <WH1696> Speak אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵ֤י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> and say אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <WH413> to כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When תָבֹ֣אוּ <WH935> unto them When ye be come אֶל־ <WH413> about הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> into the land אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which אֲנִי֙ <WH589> I am נֹתֵ֣ן <WH5414> which I give לָכֶ֔ם וּקְצַרְתֶּ֖ם <WH7114> unto you and shall reap אֶת־ <WH853> קְצִירָ֑הּ <WH7105> the harvest וַהֲבֵאתֶ֥ם <WH935> thereof then ye shall bring אֶת־ <WH853> עֹ֛מֶר <WH6016> a sheaf רֵאשִׁ֥ית <WH7225> of the firstfruits קְצִירְכֶ֖ם <WH7105> of your harvest אֶל־ <WH413> to הַכֹּהֵֽן׃ <WH3548> unto the priest

וְהֵנִ֧יף <WH5130> And he shall wave אֶת־ <WH853> הָעֹ֛מֶר <WH6016> the sheaf לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD לִֽרְצֹנְכֶ֑ם <WH7522> to be accepted מִֽמָּחֳרַת֙ <WH4283> for you on the morrow הַשַּׁבָּ֔ת <WH7676> after the sabbath יְנִיפֶ֖נּוּ <WH5130> shall wave הַכֹּהֵֽן׃ <WH3548> the priest

וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֕ם <WH6213> And ye shall offer בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> that day הֲנִֽיפְכֶ֖ם <WH5130> when ye wave אֶת־ <WH853> הָעֹ֑מֶר <WH6016> the sheaf כֶּ֣בֶשׂ <WH3532> an he lamb תָּמִ֧ים <WH8549> without blemish בֶּן־ <WH1121> of the first שְׁנָת֛וֹ <WH8141> year לְעֹלָ֖ה <WH5930> for a burnt offering לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD

וּמִנְחָתוֹ֩ <WH4503> And the meat offering שְׁנֵ֨י <WH8147> thereof [shall be] two עֶשְׂרֹנִ֜ים <WH6241> tenth deals סֹ֣לֶת <WH5560> of fine flour בְּלוּלָ֥ה <WH1101> mingled בַשֶּׁ֛מֶן <WH8081> with oil אִשֶּׁ֥ה <WH801> an offering made by fire לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD רֵ֣יחַ <WH7381> savour נִיחֹ֑חַ <WH5207> [for] a sweet וְנִסְכֹּ֥ה <WH5262> and the drink offering יַ֖יִן <WH3196> thereof [shall be] of wine רְבִיעִ֥ת <WH7243> the fourth הַהִֽין׃ <WH1969> [part] of an hin

וְלֶחֶם֩ <WH3899> neither bread וְקָלִ֨י <WH7039> nor parched corn וְכַרְמֶ֜ל <WH3759> nor green ears לֹ֣א <WH3808> neither תֹֽאכְל֗וּ <WH398> And ye shall eat עַד־ <WH5704> that עֶ֙צֶם֙ <WH6106> same הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this עַ֚ד <WH5704> until הֲבִ֣יאֲכֶ֔ם <WH935> ye have brought אֶת־ <WH853> קָרְבַּ֖ן <WH7133> an offering אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֑ם <WH430> unto your God חֻקַּ֤ת <WH2708> [it shall be] a statute עוֹלָם֙ <WH5769> for ever לְדֹרֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <WH1755> throughout your generations בְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> all מֹשְׁבֹֽתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH4186> in all your dwellings ס

וּסְפַרְתֶּ֤ם <WH5608> And ye shall count לָכֶם֙ מִמָּחֳרַ֣ת <WH4283> unto you from the morrow הַשַּׁבָּ֔ת <WH7676> after the sabbath מִיּוֹם֙ <WH3117> from the day הֲבִ֣יאֲכֶ֔ם <WH935> that ye brought אֶת־ <WH853> עֹ֖מֶר <WH6016> the sheaf הַתְּנוּפָ֑ה <WH8573> of the wave offering שֶׁ֥בַע <WH7651> seven שַׁבָּת֖וֹת <WH7676> sabbaths תְּמִימֹ֥ת <WH8549> complete תִּהְיֶֽינָה׃ <WH1961> shall be

עַ֣ד <WH5704> Even unto מִֽמָּחֳרַ֤ת <WH4283> the morrow הַשַּׁבָּת֙ <WH7676> sabbath הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔ת <WH7637> after the seventh תִּסְפְּר֖וּ <WH5608> shall ye number חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <WH2572> fifty י֑וֹם <WH3117> days וְהִקְרַבְתֶּ֛ם <WH7126> and ye shall offer מִנְחָ֥ה <WH4503> meat offering חֲדָשָׁ֖ה <WH2319> a new לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD

מִמּוֹשְׁבֹ֨תֵיכֶ֜ם <WH4186> of your habitations תָּבִ֣יאּוּ ׀ <WH935> Ye shall bring out לֶ֣חֶם <WH3899> loaves תְּנוּפָ֗ה <WH8573> wave שְׁ֚תַּיִם <WH8147> two שְׁנֵ֣י <WH8147> of two עֶשְׂרֹנִ֔ים <WH6241> tenth deals סֹ֣לֶת <WH5560> they shall be of fine flour תִּהְיֶ֔ינָה <WH1961> become חָמֵ֖ץ <WH2557> with leaven תֵּאָפֶ֑ינָה <WH644> they shall be baken בִּכּוּרִ֖ים <WH1061> [they are] the firstfruits לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD

וְהִקְרַבְתֶּ֣ם <WH7126> And ye shall offer עַל־ <WH5921> Along הַלֶּ֗חֶם <WH3899> with the bread שִׁבְעַ֨ת <WH7651> seven כְּבָשִׂ֤ים <WH3532> lambs תְּמִימִם֙ <WH8549> without blemish בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the first שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> year וּפַ֧ר <WH6499> bullock בֶּן־ <WH1121> old בָּקָ֛ר <WH1241> of the herd אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> and one וְאֵילִ֣ם <WH352> rams שְׁנָ֑יִם <WH8147> and two יִהְי֤וּ <WH1961> are to be a עֹלָה֙ <WH5930> they shall be [for] a burnt offering לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto the LORD וּמִנְחָתָם֙ <WH4503> with their meat offering וְנִסְכֵּיהֶ֔ם <WH5262> and their drink offerings אִשֵּׁ֥ה <WH801> [even] an offering made by fire רֵֽיחַ־ <WH7381> savour נִיחֹ֖חַ <WH5207> of sweet לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD

וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֛ם <WH6213> Then ye shall sacrifice שְׂעִיר־ <WH8163> kid עִזִּ֥ים <WH5795> of the goats אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> one לְחַטָּ֑את <WH2403> for a sin offering וּשְׁנֵ֧י <WH8147> and two כְבָשִׂ֛ים <WH3532> lambs בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the first שָׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> year לְזֶ֥בַח <WH2077> for a sacrifice שְׁלָמִֽים׃ <WH8002> of peace offerings

וְהֵנִ֣יף <WH5130> shall wave הַכֹּהֵ֣ן ׀ <WH3548> And the priest אֹתָ֡ם <WH853> עַל֩ <WH5921> with לֶ֨חֶם <WH3899> them with the bread הַבִּכּוּרִ֤ים <WH1061> of the firstfruits תְּנוּפָה֙ <WH8573> [for] a wave offering לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> with שְׁנֵ֖י <WH8147> with the two כְּבָשִׂ֑ים <WH3532> lambs קֹ֛דֶשׁ <WH6944> they shall be holy יִהְי֥וּ <WH1961> become לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> to the LORD לַכֹּהֵֽן׃ <WH3548> for the priest

וּקְרָאתֶ֞ם <WH7121> And ye shall proclaim בְּעֶ֣צֶם ׀ <WH6106> on the selfsame הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַזֶּ֗ה <WH2088> this מִֽקְרָא־ <WH4744> convocation קֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <WH6944> [that] it may be an holy יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> have לָכֶ֔ם כָּל־ <WH3605> all מְלֶ֥אכֶת <WH4399> work עֲבֹדָ֖ה <WH5656> no servile לֹ֣א <WH3808> not תַעֲשׂ֑וּ <WH6213> unto you ye shall do חֻקַּ֥ת <WH2708> [therein it shall be] a statute עוֹלָ֛ם <WH5769> for ever בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all מוֹשְׁבֹ֥תֵיכֶ֖ם <WH4186> in all your dwellings לְדֹרֹֽתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH1755> throughout your generations

וּֽבְקֻצְרְכֶ֞ם <WH7114> And when ye reap אֶת־ <WH853> קְצִ֣יר <WH7105> the harvest אַרְצְכֶ֗ם <WH776> of your land לֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor תְכַלֶּ֞ה <WH3615> thou shalt not make clean riddance פְּאַ֤ת <WH6285> of the corners שָֽׂדְךָ֙ <WH7704> of thy field בְּקֻצְרֶ֔ךָ <WH7114> when thou reapest וְלֶ֥קֶט <WH3951> any gleaning קְצִירְךָ֖ <WH7105> of thy harvest לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor תְלַקֵּ֑ט <WH3950> neither shalt thou gather לֶֽעָנִ֤י <WH6041> them unto the poor וְלַגֵּר֙ <WH1616> and to the stranger תַּעֲזֹ֣ב <WH5800> thou shalt leave אֹתָ֔ם <WH853> אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I am יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH430> your God ס
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

דַּבֵּ֛ר <WH1696> Speak אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying בַּחֹ֨דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הַשְּׁבִיעִ֜י <WH7637> In the seventh בְּאֶחָ֣ד <WH259> in the first לַחֹ֗דֶשׁ <WH2320> [day] of the month יִהְיֶ֤ה <WH1961> shall have לָכֶם֙ שַׁבָּת֔וֹן <WH7677> shall ye have a sabbath זִכְר֥וֹן <WH2146> a memorial תְּרוּעָ֖ה <WH8643> of blowing מִקְרָא־ <WH4744> convocation קֹֽדֶשׁ׃ <WH6944> of trumpets an holy

כָּל־ <WH3605> any מְלֶ֥אכֶת <WH4399> work עֲבֹדָ֖ה <WH5656> no servile לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not תַעֲשׂ֑וּ <WH6213> Ye shall do וְהִקְרַבְתֶּ֥ם <WH7126> [therein] but ye shall offer אִשֶּׁ֖ה <WH801> an offering made by fire לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD ס
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

אַ֡ךְ <WH389> Also בֶּעָשׂ֣וֹר <WH6218> on the tenth לַחֹדֶשׁ֩ <WH2320> month הַשְּׁבִיעִ֨י <WH7637> [day] of this seventh הַזֶּ֜ה <WH2088> of this י֧וֹם <WH3117> [there shall be] a day הַכִּפֻּרִ֣ים <WH3725> of atonement ה֗וּא <WH1931> he מִֽקְרָא־ <WH4744> convocation קֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <WH6944> it shall be an holy יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> become לָכֶ֔ם וְעִנִּיתֶ֖ם <WH6031> unto you and ye shall afflict אֶת־ <WH853> נַפְשֹׁתֵיכֶ֑ם <WH5315> your souls וְהִקְרַבְתֶּ֥ם <WH7126> and offer אִשֶּׁ֖ה <WH801> an offering made by fire לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD
